EmailTemplate.description: To notify Orientation Staff that a unit has been tagged and to call the customer for add-ons
EmailTemplate.name: Barrie Orientation Specialist Add On Call
EmailTemplate.subject: Orientation Specialist Add-On Call
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi Dave,
This is to notify you that {!Account.Name}'s package has been tagged. Please call the customer to offer them any add on options before their package is brought into the shop to be built. Once the call is complete, please create the Work Order.
Thank you
